name: Boxy's Adventure (Demo)
description:
In Boxy's Adventure, you play as a cardboard box named Boxy, in a warehouse, trying to find his friends. You have the unique ability to jump inside other boxes to help you jump higher, get over spikes, and use switches! Can you clear all sections of the warehouse?

This game is mainly a demonstration of a more complex idea that I might carry on developing, depending on how the reception for this demo goes. I might add a level editor, a new user interface, more customisable controls and tutorials, as well as new blocks, boxes, and game mechanics.

Made for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2022

Coding, Concept and In-game Art by Jamaco

Box Art/Title Screen by Michael Zhang

Music by Kevin Macleod from incompetech.com

Sound Effects by Mike Koenig from soundbible.com
